message.content:
{"id": "109718", "title": "Bug 109718 - Tips show the content of a large text item in one line", "description": "When a large content is entered in a text item and the mouse pointer is placed over the text item, the tips are displayed in one line instead of the expected format. It is necessary for the tips to show the content in the given format.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Insert a text in the layout with the following content: 'Contents1. MINOR ENHANCEMENTS 32.1 PROVIDE PROPERTY GROUP INFORMATION ON ELEMENTDEFN CLASS 32.2 COMPLETE THE TODO TASKS 32.3 REVIEW RESULT 32.4 MESSAGE FILE ENHANCEMENT 4 CURRENTLY WE STORE THE ERROR MESSAGE FOR EXCEPTIONS IN THE MESSAGE.PROPERTY FILE. NEW FEATURES 53.1 RHINO EXPRESSION PARSER 53.2 STRUCTURE TYPE SUPPORT 63.3 NEW SYSTEM 64. QA TEST SUPPORTING 7'
2. Place the mouse pointer over the text item.

Expected Result: The tips should show the content in the given format.
Actual Result: The tips show the content in one line.", "OB": "The tips should match the given format and display the content as expected.", "EB": "The parameter for the element name and property name should be provided when displaying the tips.", "SR": "Check the code implementation to ensure the parameter for the element name and property name is properly provided when displaying the tips."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '109718', 'title': 'Bug 109718Put large content in text item, the tips shows the content in one line', 'description': 'INTRODUCTION 32. SOME OF THE ERROR MESSAGE DOESN?? ?T HAVE ENOUGH INFORMATION FOR USER TOIDENTIFY THE ERROR. 42.5 ADD JAVASCRIPT OBJECT 42.6 SUPPORT DROP IN THE GROUP HEADER 42.7 PROVIDE UNDOABLE TRANSACTION 42.8 USER PROPERTY REVISION 52.9 HELP GUI TO FILTRATE THE UNNECESSARY NOTIFICATIONS 53. ELEMENT EXTENSION 65. Save and put mouse on the text itemExpected Result:tips shows in given formatActual Result:tips shows in one line ', 'OB': '', 'EB': 'THE PARAMETER FOR ELEMENT NAME AND PROPERTY NAME SHOULD BEPROVIDED. ', 'SR': 'Steps to reproduce:1.Insert a text in the layout, input "Contents1. MINOR ENHANCEMENTS 32.1 PROVIDE PROPERTY GROUP INFORMATION ON ELEMETNDEFN CLASS 32.2 COMPLETE THE TODO TASKS 32.3 REVIEW RESULT 32.4 MESSAGE FILE ENHANCEMENT 4CURRENTLY WE STORE THE ERROR MESSAGE FOR EXCEPTIONS IN THE MESSAGE.PROPERTYFILE. NEW FEATURES 53.1 RHINO EXPRESSION PARSER 53.2 STRUCTURE TYPE SUPPORT 63.3 NEW SYSTEM 64. QA TEST SUPPORTING 7"2. '}
